references.reason: This paper introduced denoising diffusion probabilistic models, a foundational model for many video generation techniques, including the one presented in this paper.

references.paper_title: High-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models
references.reason: This work is highly influential in establishing latent diffusion models as a state-of-the-art approach in image generation, providing a foundation that is readily adaptable for video generation.

references.paper_title: Video generation models as world simulators
references.reason: This paper demonstrates the impressive capabilities of large-scale video generation models in producing high-quality, temporally consistent videos and their potential as world simulators.

references.paper_title: Stable video diffusion: Scaling latent video diffusion models to large datasets
references.reason: This paper shows how latent video diffusion models can be successfully scaled using large datasets, which is crucial for achieving high-quality video generation.

references.paper_title: Sparsectrl: Adding sparse controls to text-to-video diffusion models
references.reason: This work is highly relevant due to its focus on controllable video generation, a key challenge addressed by the current paper, showing how to integrate control into text-to-video diffusion models.
